name: Frost n Flame
description:
A 2d platformer game where you can control the temperature to complete the levels. There are total 8 levels which you have to complete while avoiding the obstacles and changing the temperature.

How to Play

The controls are simple!

WASD to move, Space to Jump and J to switch to Hot & K to switch to Cold temperature.

Objective: You have to complete the levels by switching temperature and joining the crate with the pressure plate to open doors.

Credits

Sound FX: Some i made myself and some from pixabay.

Assets: Adil(Me)

Music: Adil (Me)

Godot Wild Jam

This game is made for Godot wild jam # 53 in a time span of 6 days.

Thanks for playing the game!
